begModal.sorryToDisturb:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for an introductory message in a modal asking for donations
**UI Location**: Beg Modal (top left section, sub-heading)
**When Users See This**: When the donation request modal appears
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Sorry to disturb, but..."
begModal.weNeedYourHelp:
**Functional Purpose**: Main heading for a donation request modal
**UI Location**: Beg Modal (top left section, main heading)
**When Users See This**: When the donation request modal appears
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "We need your help!"
begModal.cantAffordIt:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a section about alternative ways to help if donation isn't possible
**UI Location**: Beg Modal (left section, sub-heading)
**When Users See This**: When the donation request modal appears
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Can't afford it?"
begModal.shareExercism:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanation for users who cannot afford to donate on how they can still help
**UI Location**: Beg Modal (left section, paragraph below 'Can't afford it?' heading)
**When Users See This**: When the donation request modal appears and the user reviews alternative ways to help
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "If you can't afford to donate, but would like to help in some other way, please share Exercism with your friends and colleagues, and shout about us on social media. The more people that use us, the more donations we get!"
begModal.wantToKnowMore:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a section introducing a video about why donations are needed
**UI Location**: Beg Modal (left section, sub-heading)
**When Users See This**: When the donation request modal appears and the user looks for more information
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Want to know more?"
begModal.explainsWhyWeNeedDonations:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory text for a video explaining the purpose of donations
**UI Location**: Beg Modal (left section, paragraph below 'Want to know more?' heading)

begModal.fewerThan1Percent:
